column4: Is it possible to gain a remote "tty" session, or only locally (not pts)?
So is it possible to start a TTY session onther than CTRL-ALT-F1/2/3.. ?
those are the historic shortcuts, you can probably configure X to do something about that
what I am asking is if it is safe to say that if the session is "tty", as opposed to "pts", that it can be considered secure and did not come in over the network
